languages.text: {n}Скривившийся в гримасе рот кормчего дергается, словно он пытается улыбнуться. Выходит скорее жутко, чем приветливо.{/n} "Да-а... ну, я тоже удивлен, что вы мне не торопитесь плетей за непочтительность всыпать. Вон оно как, значит бывает..."

{n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth twitches as if he's trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than friendly.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I'm pleasantly surprised myself that you aren't having me flogged for insubordination. Will wonders never cease?"
languages.original_text: {n}Скривившийся в гримасе рот кормчего дергается, словно он пытается улыбнуться. Выходит скорее жутко, чем приветливо.{/n} "Да-а... ну, я тоже удивлен, что вы мне не торопитесь плетей за непочтительность всыпать. Вон оно как, значит бывает..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth wriggles as if he was trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than welcoming.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I too am surprised you are not ordering to have me flogged for insubordination. Will wonders ever cease..."

{n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth wriggles as if he was trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than welcoming.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I too am surprised you are not ordering to have me flogged for insubordination. Will wonders ever cease..."

{n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth wriggles as if he was trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than welcoming.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I too am surprised you are not ordering to have me flogged for insubordination. Will the wonders ever cease..."

{n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth wriggles as if he was trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than welcoming.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I too am surprised you are not ordering to have me flogged for insubordination. Will the wonders ever cease..."

{n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth twitches as if he's trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than friendly.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I'm pleasantly surprised myself that you aren't having me flogged for insubordination. Will wonders never cease?"

{n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth twitches as if he's trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than friendly.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I'm pleasantly surprised myself that you aren't having me flogged for insubordination. Will wonders never cease?"

languages.text: {n}这位舵手始终扭曲的嘴角抽搐着，仿佛在努力地挤出个笑容。他的笑容看起来并不友好，反而似乎很阴沉。{/n}“噢，是这样吗？呃，老实说，我真的很惊喜，因为你并没有因为我态度不好而用鞭子抽我。奇迹总是会有的，是吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth twitches as if he's trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than friendly.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I'm pleasantly surprised myself that you aren't having me flogged for insubordination. Will wonders never cease?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这位舵手始终扭曲的嘴角抽搐着，仿佛在努力地挤出个笑容。他的笑容看起来并不友好，反而似乎很阴沉。{/n}“噢，是这样吗？呃，老实说，我真的很惊喜，因为你并没有因为我态度不好而用鞭子抽我。奇迹总是会有的，是吧？”

languages.text: {n}La retorcida boca del timonel intenta sonreír, aunque el efecto es más siniestro que amistoso.{/n} «¿Ah, sí? Pues estoy sorprendido de que no esté haciendo que me flagelen por insubordinación. Menuda maravilla, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth twitches as if he's trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than friendly.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I'm pleasantly surprised myself that you aren't having me flogged for insubordination. Will wonders never cease?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La retorcida boca del timonel intenta sonreír, aunque el efecto es más siniestro que amistoso.{/n} «¿Ah, sí? Pues estoy sorprendido de que no esté haciendo que me flagelen por insubordinación. Menuda maravilla, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: {n}操舵手の常に歪んでいる口が、まるで笑顔を作ろうとしているかのように引きつる。親しみやすい笑顔というよりは、邪悪な印象を受けるものだ。{/n}「ああ、そうなのですか？反抗的な者を罰しようとなさらないのは驚きです。まだ気になることがあるのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth twitches as if he's trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than friendly.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I'm pleasantly surprised myself that you aren't having me flogged for insubordination. Will wonders never cease?"

traits.locale_text: {n}操舵手のずっと歪んでいる口が、まるで笑おうとしているかのように動く。親しみやすい笑顔というよりは、不吉な印象を受けるものだ。{/n}「ああ、そうなのですか？反抗的な態度で、私を鞭打とうとしないというのは驚きです。まだ気になることがあるのでしょうか？」

languages.text: {n}Der entstellte Mund des Steuermanns verzieht sich zu einem Lächeln. Einem Lächeln, das allerdings eher düster als freundlich wirkt.{/n} "Ach ja? Tja, dann bin ich ja angenehm überrascht, dass Ihr mich nicht wegen Insubordination auspeitschen lasst. Hören die Wunder denn nie auf?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth twitches as if he's trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than friendly.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I'm pleasantly surprised myself that you aren't having me flogged for insubordination. Will wonders never cease?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der entstellte Mund des Steuermanns verzieht sich zu einem Lächeln. Einem Lächeln, das allerdings eher düster als freundlich wirkt.{/n} "Ach ja? Tja, dann bin ich ja angenehm überrascht, dass Ihr mich nicht wegen Insubordination auspeitschen lasst. Hören die Wunder denn nie auf?"

languages.text: {n}L'expression perpétuellement renfrognée du timonier se fait plus sinistre encore quand il tente d'esquisser un sourire.{/n} « Voyez-vous ça ! Eh bien, je suis agréablement surpris que vous ne me fassiez pas donner le fouet pour insubordination. C'est un jour à marquer d'une pierre blanche. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth twitches as if he's trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than friendly.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I'm pleasantly surprised myself that you aren't having me flogged for insubordination. Will wonders never cease?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression perpétuellement renfrognée du timonier se fait plus sinistre encore quand il tente d'esquisser un sourire.{/n} « Voyez-vous ça ! Eh bien, je suis agréablement surpris que vous ne me fassiez pas donner le fouet pour insubordination. C'est un jour à marquer d'une pierre blanche. »

languages.text: {n}Serdümenin daima bükük olan ağzı, sanki gülümsemeye çalışıyormuşçasına seğiriyor ama ortaya çıkan manzara, içini ısıtmak yerine ürpertiyor.{/n} "Öyle mi? Beni itaatsizlikten kamçılatmamanız hoş sürpriz oldu doğrusu. Bir yaşıma daha girdim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Helmsman's perpetually twisted mouth twitches as if he's trying to smile. It looks sinister rather than friendly.{/n} "Oh yeah? Well, I'm pleasantly surprised myself that you aren't having me flogged for insubordination. Will wonders never cease?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Serdümenin daima bükük olan ağzı, sanki gülümsemeye çalışıyormuşçasına seğiriyor ama ortaya çıkan manzara, içini ısıtmak yerine ürpertiyor.{/n} "Öyle mi? Beni itaatsizlikten kamçılatmamanız hoş sürpriz oldu doğrusu. Bir yaşıma daha girdim!"
